gameDescription: The game idea in short is that when the game starts, the mobile passes to each player, and all players are shown a single word except for one player who is shown something different. All players try to figure out who the spy is, and the spy tries to blend in with them and avoid being suspected.
classicModeDescription: In this mode, the spy sees the words (You Are The Spy), so they know they are the spy and try to blend in.
blindModeDescription: In this mode, the spy sees a word that is different from the others. This means no one, including the spy, knows who the spy is.
noNameValidate: You can't add an empty player (:
nowYouCanAskOrVote: Now you can vote or ask again
wordRevealText: Press show to see the word and don't let anyone else see it
